### Tender Notice

#### Project Details
---------------

*   **Project Title**: HVAC Assessment and Replacement, and Carbon Neutral Studies
*   **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   **End User Entity**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans, NorthWest Territories
*   **Location**: Hay River, NT

#### Short Description
-------------------

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans, NorthWest Territories, requires a mechanical engineering firm to provide a multidisciplinary team of consultants for the delivery of services required for this HVAC Assessment, Carbon Neutral Study, and Replacement project. The successful proponent will be responsible for the following:

*   Development of a complete proposal, including qualifications, experience, and organization of the proposed consultant team
*   Approach to performing the technical work
*   Pricing and terms offered

#### Mandatory Requirements
-------------------------

This procurement contains mandatory requirements. Failing to comply may result in the rejection of bids.
